languages.text: "Ты умелый боец, мне бы такие пригодились. Не хочешь продлить свое пребывание в моей свите?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты умелый боец, мне бы такие пригодились. Не хочешь продлить свое пребывание в моей свите?"

languages.text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"
languages.original_text: "Ты умелый боец, мне бы такие пригодились. Не хочешь продлить свое пребывание в моей свите?"

traits.locale_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use such men. Would you like to extend your stay in my retinue?"
"You are a skilled fighter, I could use such men. Would you like to extend your stay in my retinue?"
"You are a skilled fighter, I could use such men. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"
"You are a skilled fighter, I could use such men. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"
"You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"
"You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

languages.text: « Vous êtes un combattant émérite. J'ai besoin de personnes de cette trempe. Que diriez-vous de prolonger votre séjour à mes côtés ? »
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un combattant émérite. J'ai besoin d'hommes tels que vous. Que diriez-vous de prolonger votre séjour à mes côtés ? »

languages.text: “你是位老练的战士，我需要你这样的人。不如你在我的队伍里多待一会吧？”
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: “你是位老练的战士，我需要这样的人。不如你在我的队伍里多待一会吧？”

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein fähiger Kämpfer, ich könnte Leute wie Euch gebrauchen. Was sagt Ihr, wollen wir Eure Zugehörigkeit zu meinem Gefolge verlängern?"
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein fähiger Kämpfer, ich könnte solche Männer gebrauchen. Was sagt Ihr, wollen wir Eure Zugehörigkeit zu meinem Gefolge verlängern?"

languages.text: «Se le da bien luchar, me vendría bien. ¿Qué le parece permanecer en mi séquito por más tiempo?».
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: «Se le da bien luchar, me vendría bien. ¿Qué le parece permanecer en mi séquito por más tiempo?».

languages.text: 「お前は腕の立つ戦士だ。お前のような人材であれば、ぜひとも欲しい。我が従者としてある期間を伸ばせと言ったらどうする？」
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は腕の立つ戦士だ。お前のような人材であれば、ぜひとも欲しい。我が従者としてある期間を伸ばせと言ったらどうする？」

languages.text: "Maharetli bir savaşçısın, senin gibi biri işime yarar. Maiyetimde kalma süreni biraz uzatmamıza ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: "You are a skilled fighter, I could use people like you. What do you say we extend your stay in my retinue?"

traits.locale_text: "Yetenekli bir savaşçısın, senin gibi biri işime yarar. Maiyetimde kalma süreni biraz uzatmamıza ne dersin?"
